name: Doors & Rooms - Living Room
description:
This time you find yourself trapped in a comfy living room but for some strange reason your mission is to escape. So get up and start searching for the way out.
Enter this escaping adventure full of mini-puzzles, combining items and smartphone magic!
Enough of chitchat... Escape!

Features
Challenging logic puzzles
Beautiful graphics
Easy to start – hard to put down
Smartphone's magic

How to play
Find and use items
Solve mini-puzzles
Use your device (tilting and shaking)
